sections.content:
Question:
Can I purchase RZ/G2L Evaluation Board Kit and incorporate it into a set for mass production?
Answer:
RZ/G2L Evaluation Board Kit is a board intended for evaluation, and cannot be incorporated into your set for mass production. Mass-production ready partner boards are also available. Please see the following page. 
https://www.renesas.com/products/microcontrollers-microprocessors/rz-mpus/rz-partner-solutions#quick-link-2846
Suitable Products
RZ/G2L
